definitions.definition: Alternative letter-case form of Chimera , a supposed monster in Lycia with the head of a lion , body of a goat , and tail of a dragon or serpent , killed by the hero Bellerophon .
examples: The game includes a bunch of chimeras , with the lion heads shooting fire and the snake tails whipping around trying to bite the player.

definitions.definition: Any fantastic creature combining parts from different animals .
A foolish , incongruous , or vain thought or product of the imagination .
Anything composed of very disparate parts.
examples: He built his car one piece at a time, producing a chimera with the head of a Volkswagen , the body of a Geely , and the tail of an aftermarket Porsche .

definitions.definition: A grotesque like a gargoyle , but without a spout for rainwater .
An organism with genetically distinct cells originating from two or more zygotes .
examples: The DNA test returned a false negative because the killer was a chimera , having absorbed her twin in utero .

definitions.definition: Alternative form of chimaera , a cartilaginous marine fish in the subclass Holocephali and especially the order Chimaeriformes , with a blunt snout , long tail, and a spine before the first dorsal fin .
Synonym of bogeyman : any terrifying thing , especially as an unreal , imagined threat .

main_definition: ( Greek mythology ) Alternative letter-case form of Chimera , a supposed monster in Lycia with the head of a lion , body of a goat , and tail of a dragon or serpent , killed by the hero Bellerophon .
secondary_definitions: ( mythology , art ) Any fantastic creature combining parts from different animals .
( figurative ) A foolish , incongruous , or vain thought or product of the imagination .
( figurative ) Anything composed of very disparate parts.
( architecture ) A grotesque like a gargoyle , but without a spout for rainwater .
( genetics ) An organism with genetically distinct cells originating from two or more zygotes .

( zoology ) Alternative form of chimaera , a cartilaginous marine fish in the subclass Holocephali and especially the order Chimaeriformes , with a blunt snout , long tail, and a spine before the first dorsal fin .
( figurative ) Synonym of bogeyman : any terrifying thing , especially as an unreal , imagined threat .
